alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 13 at 5:43PM MST until September 13 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MST FOR VERDE VILLAGE AREA IN YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 541 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bignotti, or 8 miles northwest of Camp Verde, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Verde Village, Bridgeport, Cottonwood, Bignotti, Jordan, Cornville, Tissaw Trailhead, Hayfield Draw OHV Area, Cottonwood Airport, Mormons Crossing Swimming Hole, Deadhorse Ranch State Park, and McGuireville. This includes the following highways... State Route 260 between mile markers 207 and 213. State Route 89A between mile markers 352 and 358. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
